intro: Guettarda fanshawei, commonly known as the Chinese hibiscus, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Malvaceae family and is characterized by its showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. The plant has dark green, ovate leaves with a slightly rough texture. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes. Guettarda fanshawei prefers well-drained soil and partial to full sunlight.
